Welcome to KuramotoNetworksPackage’s documentation!

KuramotoNetworksPackage is a repository (that can be used as a python library) to simulate the Partially Forced and Delayed Kuramoto model. Also, it contains scripts with useful tools to do network analysis and functional analysis, with a computational neuroscience focus.

This repository is parte of the research Project Anillo ANID “Vibrain”.

Visit us here: Vibrain Web

The analysis tools are under development!

The inspiration of the model comes form Steven Strogatz and Joana Cabral works.

  • Model
    • Kuramoto model
    • Configuration file parser
  • Analysis Tools
    • Cluster analysis
    • Analysis of connectivity matrices
    • Frequency-domain analysis tools
    • Synchrony analysis tools
  • Plot Tools
    • Animation of Kuramoto Order Parameter
    • Circular plots
    • Networkx plots
    • Scatter plots
    • Video for the two nodes system
  • Simulations
    • Test Model
    • Test Model with configuration file
  • Summary
